title: America Isn’t Evil | Guests: Michael Knowles & Niger Innis | 6/19/20
description:
It’s our turn to stand up for our country, families, love, and peace against Marxist revolutionaries. StoryCorps founder Dave Isay joins with a powerful story this Father’s Day weekend. Aunt Jemima is black America’s favorite syrup by far. The Daily Wire’s Michael Knowles tells the real story of Columbus and today’s revolts against Western civilization. Glenn gives the history of Juneteenth and the powerful lesson it teaches. Civil rights leader Niger Innis makes the case that today’s so-called civil rights movement is just the latest in the war on black families. Christopher Ferrara, special counsel of the Thomas More Society, joins after Orthodox Jews sue NYC mayor Bill de Blasio and Gov. Cuomo for “blatant” lockdown double standards.
